No Poverty.reason: The course covers financial management basics which can indirectly help individuals manage their finances, but does not explicitly address poverty alleviation strategies.
evidence: handle the financial issues faced in their everyday life

Quality Education.reason: The course provides education in financial management, helping students understand finance better and handle financial issues in a more educated way.
evidence: This course will help you understand the finance subject of study better.
Others will be able to handle the financial issues faced in their everyday life in a more educated way.

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course covers financial markets, capital structure, project evaluation, and investment decisions, which are fundamental to economic growth and business operations.

Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Topics like capital budgeting, project evaluation, and financial markets are essential for financing industry, innovation, and infrastructure development.

Reduced Inequalities.reason: No explicit mention of reducing inequalities, wealth distribution, or policies aimed at addressing disparities.

Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions.reason: No explicit mention of peace, justice, governance, or strengthening institutions as a primary focus of the course.
